title: Ultra-rich women in Europe in 2014 , by personal fortune value
yAxis: Value of wealth in billion euros
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Value of wealth in billion euros in the y axis.
The Value of wealth in billion euros is appeared to be the highest at Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) and lowest at Month Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany).
The maximum Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) has got 5.84 times higher Value of wealth in billion euros than the minimum Month Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany).
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Value of wealth in billion euros in the y axis.

The maximum Value of wealth in billion euros 25.1 is found at Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) and the minimum is found at Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany) where Value of wealth in billion euros is 4.3.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Value of wealth in billion euros in the y axis.
The Value of wealth in billion euros is appeared to be the highest at Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) and lowest at Month Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany).
The maximum Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) has got 5.84 times higher Value of wealth in billion euros than the minimum Month Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany).
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Value of wealth in billion euros for 10 number of Months.

The maximum Value of wealth in billion euros 25.1 is found at Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) and the minimum is found at Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany) where Value of wealth in billion euros is 4.3.
The highest Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) has 20.8 more Value of wealth in billion euros than the lowest Month Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany).
Value of wealth in billion euros at Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) is 25.1 , second place is  at 25.1, and thirdly is Johanna Quandt (BMW Germany) at 10.7.
The Value of wealth in billion euros has reduced over the past 10 Months.
Month Margarita Louis Dreyfus (Louis Dreyfus Switzerland), and Antonia Axson Johnson (Axel Johnson Group Sweden) have the same Value of wealth in billion euros.
Considered together, the average Value of wealth in billion euros in all 10 Months is roughly 8.68.
The Value of wealth in billion euros is 86.8 if we add up values of all Months.

data.Month: Antonia Axson Johnson (Axel Johnson Group Sweden)
